title: Alcatel 1T7 1 GB RAM 8 GB ROM 7 inch with Wi-Fi Only Tablet (Bluish Black)

product_specification.Additional Features: FM Radio, Kids Mode, 720p Video Streaming Supported at 30 fps, Water and Dust Resistant
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Power Adapter, USB Cable, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Display Features: LED Backlit Multi Touch Display with TFT Technology
product_specification.Video Formats Supported: MP4, H.263, H.264 AVC, H.265 HEVC, MPEG-4 SP, VP8, VP9
product_specification.Audio Formats Supported: AAC LC, HE-AACv1 (AAC+), HE-AACv2 (Enhanced AAC+), AAC ELD (Enhanced Low Delay AAC), AMR-NB, AMR-WB, FLAC, MP3, MIDI, Vorbis, PCM/Wave
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Premium Finish: This light-weighing tablet can be the perfect companion on long trips, daily commute, and so on. Its exclusive 3D pattern ensures that you get a better grip so that you can comfortably use it.
product_description.Front and Rear Cameras: With this tablet's 5 MP rear camera, you can capture stunning photos during vacations, festive occasions, and so on. And, with its 2 MP integrated front camera, you can stay in touch with your friends by video calling them whenever you want.
product_description.Kids Mode: Thanks to the Kids Mode, your child will be delighted to play with this tablet's preloaded ad-free apps. You can also use the built-in easy-to-use parental control panel to set the usage time and to the select the appropriate apps for your kids.
product_description.Eye Care: This feature reduces blue light exposure while using the tablet so that your sleep patterns stay unaffected and to relieve you of visual fatigue.
product_description.Wi-Fi and In-built FM Radio: You can connect this table to your home Wi-Fi and stream YouTube videos and movies from video streaming apps. You can also sing and dance along to the latest chartbusters (thanks to the in-built FM radio) to set the right mood with your friends or family.
product_description.More Storage Space for More Entertainmen: With this tablet, you can get up to two times more available storage as it comes with few pre-installed apps and smaller app sizes. This way, you get more storage space to download more apps, store more photos, and so on.
product_description.Data Saving: To ensure optimal usage and control of your data, this tablet comes with a built-in data manager and more options. This way, you can manage and control which apps get to use the data so that you don't prematurely exceed your monthly data limit.
product_description.Security: With Google Play Protect (built-in security), your tablet is protected 24/7.
product_description.Enhanced Performance: As this tablet comes with lighter apps and a fast operating system, it will not run slowly. This means that you get to enjoy YouTube Go, which enables you to enjoy and discover new videos (without buffering) and share them. Gmail Go also keeps your emails safe and organised. You'll also get immediate notifications when an email arrives so that you can quickly respond to it.
product_description.Additional Entertaining Features: This tablet comes equipped with Google Go that helps you research or watch videos even when you're on a slow connection. You can also switch between languages so that you can search for answers in a language that you want. It comes with the Google Maps Go feature to enable you to quickly search for navigational directions so that you can quickly and safely reach your destination. And, with the Google Assistant for Android, you can ask it to make calls, play videos, get directions, find answers, and so on - on your behalf.

review:
Thanks to Flipkart . The best deal offered as always .
thanks to Alcatel for manufacturing this tab. Its truly value fro money. Its good for books and reading. No doubts Ms word and Powerpoint works very good, it is very convenient in use. This tab is as per my expectations. Android 8.1 Oreo helps its to work fast.
I loved the tab and recommend to all those who need the tab for reading and browsing. This one is the best . Sound quality is also good . Handsfree can be used . Over all in 3500 rs. this one is the best tab .
Im using it from just 24 hrs I hope it keep on going this best in future.

Awesome for study. Reading newspapers, books in Kindle app, NCERT etc. Pdf in Foxit Mobile Pdf app. Very light weight...
Awesome just for study purposes in my view...better than 10" display because it's easier to carry. Make some changes and it works great for study purposes.
I installed JioMags app and entered the JIO ID created in my mobile's Myjio app to read Magazines like World Focus, India Today, Partiyogita Darpan etc.
Install Microsoft Edge and enjoy reading mode better than Opera etc...
Install Foxit Mobile Pdf to read Pdf (s)...make some changes in Foxit's View option and changes in background display from white to other cream or yellowish etc. And than no need to use blue light filter (preinstalled as EyeCare).
Battery lasts more than 24 hours if used just for study purposes in Flight Mode( Normal brightness)...and more than 18 hours in WiFi mode...

5 star for Flipkart and the Customer Support team. 4 star for the Tab. The screen is not glass, its plastic /fibre hence please use the scratch guard immediately after taking off the protective sticker and before you start using the tab. Glass screen would have been heavier but better. Apart from this the tab is light weight, which is cool. 1gb ram does the job. Its smooth and steady in processing so far. Happy...

Superb 👌👌👌Amazing Android Wifi Tablet by Alcatel. Thanks to Flipkart. Works Amazing Well . lightning fast working. new Android os 8.1 Oreo go edition. nice tablet . 😎😎😎Fast Wifi Connectivity on This Tablet. Awesome. Thanks to 😎😎😎Flipkart and 😎😎😎Alcatel. Amazing Value For 💰💰💰 🤑🤑🤑.

The Tab is good an value for money. i got it for RS 2699/- including Rs 300 credit card discount. The price at time of purchase is Rs 2999/-

Flip kart delivered on time. All apps are running smoothly on Android 8 Oreo Go Edition.

Battery backup could be better .

you can use maps only for direction and not navigate on drive as there is no GPS .

It could be better if there was compass app and magnetic sensor provided with it.

Finally the tab was worth the money.

nice tablet within 5k segment.. display clarity is ok but give some strain to eyes so not suggest for kids usage frequently.. sound is sharp clarity .. performance is good .. overall it's a budget tab ..

Wanted to buy this to read books online. I feel this tablet is is great for the value that I bought it at. Obviously the camera is hopeless but I suggest this one is a great pick if you just need it for browsing etc, I dont think it will support games. I must also point out that the battery life is great! And charges also pretty efficiently. Not good if you want to download many apps. Hope this helps :)
Product is good for ideal usages like browsing , reading .Some of the streaming apps show very low quality of video.So far ok ok experience .Got this for 3000.

Excellent product.... It was delivered to me on time.... Great product and is useful for our day to day activities.... I am really happy with it.... 5 stars from my everyday experience.... No complaints at all.... Thank you Flipkart....

Very good Tablet at 3000/- price.
It gives perfect value for mobey.
Don't Expect much from it as it is giving more than its price.
Good for kids appps & watching videos.
Sound is good. Camera is average. Battery is good and lasts for 2 hrs with browsing or watching videos.
Those who complaint about display quality, please note that this is 7inch screen with average display so don't expect to get quality like your 15k mobile screen. If you keep screen very close to your eyes, you may feel that the display is bad but keep at some distance and you will enjoy. You will enjoy watching HD quality movies.
Overall I am happy with this tab. Value for money.
It comes with a Flexible Screen Protector. Applying that on screen is very difficult. It will be good if that comes applied from company itself. screen surface is uneven at edges which makes applying tempered glass screen protector difficult as it will not stick at all places and applying pressure may damage it.

Display quality very bad, battery too small for a tablet. Now a days mobiles comes with 4000-5000mah battery and this tab comes with just 2500mah battery.

Android oreo lite version is good for weak hardware but no updates, not even security patch update.

Camera quality poor no big deal for this price.
Soc very weak, you do anything in tab and it gets heated.
Speaker almost no exist, yes believe me when you will hear the sound of this tablet you will feel the same, like alcatel forget to put the speaker in this tablet and only ear piece volume increased. Very very tiny sound.

Over all will not recommend this tablet to anyone not even kids.
This table is not usable due to very weak hardware, very poor dispaly, no speaker.

Price is low compare to other tablets but you cant use this tablet so no logic of making and buying such products.
I also want to mention this tablet's build quality is so low even earphone output is too bad, my 'house of Marley' earphones worth Rs.2000 sounds like earphone worth Rs.20 when i pair them with this tablet.

Just wow, Oh My God what a tab in such a low price, prosessor is so smooth, light weight, great for reading and kids use, I purchased it for my kids online classes and it's more than my expectations, and Flipkart is the best in delivery and providing the best quality. Thank You so much.

Easy to carry n use. Does its job. Video latency a bit slow, but we are too used to our phones performing at incredible speeds. So it cannot be compared. Overall good value for money. Recommended for reading books and other utilities.
Good product l like big screen for PDF reading camera quality is not better but good screen not full HD performance is good and battery life also very good.

Good for ebook reading and web browsing.
The screen quality is worst. Performance is satisfactory even it can run Free Fire. Camera is below average. Battery life is better than I expected. It almost give 5-6 hours of screen on time and 2-3 hours of internet browsing time.
For a budget device it's bulid quality is good (I dropped it one day from 4 ft hight but still working without any visual damage) . It's pretty light weight.
For a 3k device it's value for money
Good tablet at reasonable price.. I purchased it for my son.. Could have been much better if tempered glass screen protector was provide along with it

I was expecting a little more from this tablet. It doesn't have IPS screen and therefore you cannot view the screen from angles. Slight change in viewing angle spoils the quality of picture. It takes plenty of time to charge the battery that is only 2500Mah.
The good thing is that it has plenty of free RAM even though it has only 1GB RAM. Light version of OS and APPS did the trick. The tablet is very light weight and you can easily handle it. Good product for 3k. Suitable only for people who just needs a tablet and doesn't care about display quality.
